node.node: Hey there, I'm selling pizzas.
I knew you'd be back.
Ah... back for more, I see.
Great~! Here, take a look.
You'll be back...
I pulled you out of a scraped heap of burning metal. I was afraid you weren't going to make it.
I found this in the wreck with you. Does it look familiar?
You got a Knife!
I hope you remember how to use it. (Stick 'em with the pointy end.)
The only escape from this damned place is through the castle, to the north.
Beware, the Royal Knights have lost their minds. They will attack all who cross their path.
The king hasn't been seen outside his chambers for over 1000 years.
As we speak, the land sinks deeper into this sea of primordial ether.
In a few days time, the last traces of our great nation will desolve into the sea.
Monsters from below have risen to the surface to claim our remains.
Head north to the castle. I will meet you again there.

event.node: I can equip upgrades to your gear for you.

node.text: Whatta ya say? Upgrade your gear?

node.node: Come back soon!
Let me know if you change your mind.
Oh! You're finally up.
Levi brought you in here. He's outside and up the hill.
You were all beat up and bloodied. You should really go and thank him.
Anyway... you don't have any money on you, so get out of here.

event.node: Young Adventurer's Survival Guide Serial, Issue 131.

node.text: Young Adventurer's Survival Guide Serial, Issue 131. Read it?

node.node: Hold SPACEBAR to use your suit's boost function and SHIFT to use the reverse boost function.
Propelling you forth with a focused burst of ether, the boost function will allow you to cross chasms, and dodge enemy attacks.
At the start of a boost you will absorb most enemy attacks. This Perfect Dodge will redirect that energy into your HP and EP.
Boosting will consume your energy. If depleted, your boost will be cut off, so be careful not to use it for too long!
